title: Hour 2: Hot Start
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Michael Irvin, and Ryan Clark debate which 3-0 team has had a more impressive start to their season: the Eagles or the Dolphins? Our own playmaker Michael Irvin gives us his top 3 playmakers for NFL Week 3. The crew looks ahead to tonight's MNF matchup and discuss their confidence level in Dallas' ability to take down the undefeated Giants. Plus, are the Bills putting too much pressure on Josh Allen? Stephen A. and Irvin react to Kevin Durant's first comments to the media since his offseason spectacle went down.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Which team has had the hotter start: the Dolphins or the Eagles?
